Level 20 killer just met a full team of red ranks.. dont bother (600hr review)

Update: So the state of this game is bad. If you play survivor you are fine, you might get out matched by a killer more than a few times, but at least theres four other people to help take the heat. Killer... is not fun to play. I dont play killer very often so you would expect my mmr to be low due to that fact. But no, I get full SWF red rank sweaty survivors which means i get zero hooks and very little points because they know every loop, every window and ofc swf means comms. These are the teams i get. Toxic pieces of crap that play this game to bully killers, especially new killers. I just this second had a game with a full 4 man swf with flash lights, who left one person to do the gens and then followed me around clicky clicking, tea bagging, being toxic. And this is the meta of the game. I would love for all people who play killer to just stop playing killer for a few days, just so bhvr can see how bad this is. Its not fun being bullied because u have  less than 50 hours in playing killer. It sucks, and it makes me not want to play survivor either, Im tired of this community, its one of the most toxic gaming communities out there. 

So, please, dont buy the game, dont add more to this community. My personal opinion is that this game needs to die and the devs are currently digging its grave.

I tried to play DBD a while ago, but I just couldn't get into the game, everyone felt so powerful, I felt very weak. LUCKILY I got back into the game because of some streamers I was watching. This game is one of the best PVP style games I have played in a while. The characters are pretty awesome to play/play against. Its just scary enough without making me feel like my heart is going to burst. People complain about toxic players, but I've played from rank 20 to 3 on survivor and 20 to 12 as killer and I have only experienced a handful of toxic players, most people in this game are not bad, and chances are, the people who complain about toxic killers/survivors all the time are probably toxic themselves. If you haven't played in a while, or are new to the game give it a chance!

Do not play this game unless you have friends to play with in custom matches. This game is the cause of my fingernails being missing, as I have ripped them off out of pure anger. 
This game's premise is good, and playing killer is extremely fun. Besides that and the graphics however, playing survivor will literally be the root of your life's misery. Not including the toxic players, the campers, what have you, the basics of the killers is extremely frustrating by itself. The killers possess unreasonable hit boxes, and I cannot physically describe how many times I have been hit from the opposite side of a generator, a pallet, or tree. Running and 'juking' killers is fun, except for when they hit you while you're literally behind them. A majority of people who play this game and play survivor or killer feud with one another, debating about who has it worse. As someone who plays both a killer and survivor on a daily basis, I can easily say that, in my opinion, killer is far more unbalanced. You can play a killer with little to no perks as long as you camp and be able to kill most of the entire lobby full of decked out people. 
Playing with friends that you can mess around with is the only way I've been able to feel again. My heart goes out to the solo queuers that suffer emotional abuse daily, please go to a psychiatrist or even better a rage room for help.

The game is very fun! The main issue is the community, survivor mains have a "killer rulebook" where they call every killer toxic for trying to do better in the game and killers sometimes use facecamping or tunneling methods so if you are being camped or tunneled sometimes you dont get to play much. Once you figure out how to counter these killers, or not be annoyed with the survivors then you will have a lot of fun!

In pre made groups, this can be a lot of fun!

I would rate it neutral if I could but it doesn't quite warrant a negative review because it has potential. 

The downsides-
  -The game rewards more points for "point farming" than for actually escaping and any helping of friends so it highly 
   encourages players to throw their team mates under the bus in order to move up in rank tiers. 
  -Many players will actually work with the killers to lead them to you in order to farm more points for themselves and there 
    seems to be little done to correct or deter this behavior. 
  -I have seen the actual game makers commenting in chat channels of streamers and they definitely encourage the selfish 
    play style
  -Some killer perks are way too OP so certain killers result in certain death

The upsides:
  It's creepy
  Fun with pre made groups against non OP killers
  Graphics are very nice

I used to like this game but that was before the continuing downfall of this mess. This is a horrible game made by horrible people that do not play their own game. 
New killers are added one after another without much thought put into them. Yes some killers are fun to play as but very rarely fun to play against. The ranking system is messed up constantly putting the lowest ranking players with high tier players.
A lot of the perks are shit, some granting you the ability to see the killer trough walls across the map. 
The game is not scary so the survival horror tag can be removed.
Every time I come back to this game I regret installing it after a few games. Stay away from this dreadful mess as 19.99 USD is a ripoff.
